description:
This SEO course will help you get a clear idea of how to optimize web pages the same way an SEO specialist does.

The course is structured into five major chapters, You'll learn what SEO is and how search engines rank web pages, why target audience is important and how to choose the best keywords, what the on-page SEO attributes are (all those things that have to be added to a site or modified in order for it to rank better in the search engines), how off-page SEO works (methods for obtaining links and promoting a site) and how to monitor and manage projects.

The course also contains Quizzes, which will help you test your search engine optimization knowledge and Recap and Exercise files, which will help you put into practice the things you learn.
title: SEO Course for Beginners
instructors: Ela Iliesi, Simion Alexandru, Company ONLINE REZISTANCE
